entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.12.0
entry.content:
[!CAUTION] This release switches to daily expiration checks.

You have to manually adjust the old defined periodic task to run daily.

To do so, please log into the admin panel and open the URL path /en/admin/django_celery_beat/periodictask/1/change/. There, you can adjust the old Crontab Schedule. Just hit the edit button and change Day(s) Of The Week from 1 to *. Now the expiry check runs daily as intended. See wiki here.

Features

  • switch to daily expiration checks (5170e6f)
